entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET April 2025 Updates #353
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2025-26682: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #352
  • `dotnetbinaries.blob.core.windows.net` will be taken offline on 2025-06-10 #351

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: antiforgery-validation, caching #61397
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-noop, https, mvc #61396
  • Perf improvement: json, json, json #61395
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, https #61394
  • Min API Validation should skip endpoint parameters with FromServices attribute #61392
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2025-26682: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #61390
  • Min API Validation fails for some generic types #61388
  • Make XmlKeyDecryptionOptions public OR add KeyManagementOptions.XmlDecryptor property #61386
  • MapStaticAssets not working when combined with RequireAuthenticatedUser #61385
  • Virtualize component returns empty result in Firefox when being used in shadow DOM #61384
    Backlog
  • [FromForm] Complex objects with MinimalApi and AOT #61382
  • Min API validation fails for Record types #61379

Closed

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #61287
    8.0.16
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/9.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #61290
    9.0.5
  • IL Trimming in Blazor appears to require public default constructors #61387
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #61357
  • SginIn / SginUp Pages in Modal Blazor 9.0 #61365
  • [Unified Build] Signing of .js files in `microsoft.dotnet.web.projecttemplates.x.y.z.nupkg` #61376
  • Blazor SSR: Re-render side component causes "FormMappingScope 'Name' can't change after initialization". #61389

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix handling of record types in validations source generator #61402
    area-minimal, feature-validation
  • OpenAPI: merge multiple body content types into one operation #61401
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Revert "Revert "Revert "Revert "Update .NET build URLs"""" #61400
    area-infrastructure
  • MVC: Correct metadata type for formdata enum parameters #61399
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #61398
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0 #61393
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.x
  • [Blazor] Resolve collection for registered services once #61391
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Rename MapSchemasEndoints.cs to MapSchemasEndpoints.cs #61073
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Use Copy Constructor for JsonSerializerSettings #61251
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • feat: fetch TLS client hello message from HTTP.SYS #60806
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/9.0] Caching SERedis critical bugfix; defer HC metadata detection because of DI cycle #60916
    Servicing-approved, feature-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0.x
  • Revert "Revert "[release/8.0] Update remnants of azureedge.net"" #60352
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Revert "Revert "[release/9.0] Update remnants of azureedge.net"" #60353
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.x
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • `HttpNavigationManager` no longer uses `NavigationException` #61306
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-navigation, 10.0-preview4
  • Skip some OpenAPI tests on Amd64 queue #61349
    area-commandlinetools
  • Add host.docker.internal and host.containers.internal to the dev cert SAN #61265
    area-commandlinetools
  • Add InvokeNew, GetValue & SetValue to JS interop API #61246
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-08
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Update Design-Process.md #9294
  • Style and link updates from April 2nd #9291

Updated

  • Dictionary expressions: resolve answered questions #9286

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Possible issue with Entry().Collection().Query().Load() #35924
  • Connect to different SQL Databases using efpt.config.json #35923
  • WHERE FALSE is added incorrectly #35922
  • Decimal(38,20) Conversion Overflow Error with Integer Values in EF Core #35921
  • ChangeTrackers FixupSkipNavigations throws NullReferenceException #35920
  • Support by-convention OnAdd for value-converted keys #35919
  • Support nullable complex types with all optional properties for table splitting #35918

Closed

  • Avoid virtual redispatch between SaveChangesAsync overloads #35913
  • Crash in left join against sub query #35900
  • ChangeTracker disposed in DbContext #35858

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #35927
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0 #35925

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #35926

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-08
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #20399

Merged

  • .NET Source-Build 8.0.115 April 2025 Updates #20398

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #20400

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NET10] Open Telemetry Investigations #28875
    .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [.NET10] Epic: Investigate paths to help users be more successful discovering memory and layout issues #28874
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Annotate remaining `*Converter` classes for nullability #28860
    .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [NET10] Audit Obsoleted platform APIs #28858
    .NET 10.0-preview6
  • Remove usage of MessagingCenter for showing dialogs and alerts #28857
    .NET 10.0-preview5
  • Remove internal usage of MessagingCenter #28855
    .NET 10.0-preview7
  • [NET10] Obsolete BackgroundColor #28854
    .NET 10 Planning
  • pre-defined xmlns prefixes #28850
    .NET 10 Planning
  • make the default xmlns declaration optional #28849
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Font size changes after focus when using contenteditable body in MAUI WebView on iOS #28848
    Backlog
  • Implicit global xmlns #28847
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Global xmlns #28846
    .NET 10 Planning
  • xmlns aggregation #28843
    .NET 10 Planning
  • protect maui xmlns from overloading #28839
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Incorrect Text Color Applied to Selected Tab in TabbedPage on Android #28838
    Backlog
  • XAML xmlns simplifications #28836
    .NET 10.0-preview4

Closed

  • Visibility Property Not Updating as Expected in .NET MAUI #28677
    .NET 9 SR5.1
  • [9.0.50] CollectionView display is broken when setting IsVisible after items are added #28415
    .NET 9 SR6
  • Version 8.0.15 of package microsoft.netcore.app.runtime.mono.android-arm64.msi.x64 not found #28866
  • MAUI project : FlyoutBackgroundColor and FlyoutBackground not working on windows when the FlyoutBehavior is locked after upgrade from 17.3 to 17.4 #11288
  • Flyout background doesn't change when it's locked #12825
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Element: Warning: The RealParent on Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Grid has been Garbage Collected. This should never happen. #28853
  • Microsoft.iOS version increase causing linker issue #28859
  • [iOS] InvalidOperationException for ListView with Html Label #28861
  • MeasureInvalidated events are now fired too often #25264
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [net10.0] Remove MessagingCenter #28856
  • Allow consuming XmlnsDefintiion from current assembly #28840
    .NET 10 Planning
  • An activity indicator in a collectionview header is not displayed #28732
    .NET 9 Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Revert "Cleanup virtual layer measure invalidation (#28756)" (#28872)" #28873
    community ✨
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] Backport uitest fixes to .NET9 SR5 #28871
    .NET 9 SR5.1
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] Revert Applying visibility change to child controls #28869
    .NET 9 SR5.1
  • Revert "[Accessibility] Add 'button' for TalkBalk on Android Tap Gesture Recognizers" #28868
    p/0, .NET 9 SR6
  • [2025/04/11] Candidate - In Flight Branch #28867
  • Improve TFM condition for sample content template #28865
    area-templates
  • The footer position is not on the far right of the horizontal grid - fix #28864
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28862
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fixed the span text disappeared in label when setting the font attribute on span and setting an implicit style for Label on content page #28851
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • Avoiding issues installing Appium on Linux #28845
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • Revert Applying visibility change to child controls #28768
    p/0, area-controls-general, .NET 9 SR6
  • Update Versions.props 9.0.51 #28870
  • Revert "Cleanup virtual layer measure invalidation" #28872
  • Revert "Fix HideSoftInputOnTapped Not Working Net9 " #28802

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • vscode shows metadata names in document outline #78072
  • Suppression via preprocessor directive is considered unnecessary for some diagnostics #78073
  • ShebangDirective should be unconditionally parsed #78054
    Next
  • enclose parentheses issues #78053
  • C#: Autosuggest in XMLDOCS suggests signatures that will not match after insertion when using nullable annotations with generics #78052
  • Cleanup after https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/2441480 is fixed #78050
    18.0
  • Crash compiling extension static method #78042
    Next
  • Configure Roslyn's usings quickfix to ignore certain namespaces #78040
    Backlog
  • Re-enable TransitiveVersionPinning for RoslynAnalyzers folder #78036

Closed

  • InvalidOperationException when using field keyword in a struct with 2+ fields #77909
    17.14

PullRequests

Created

  • Stop producing 32-bit NGEN Images for VS #78074
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Implement custom awaitable support #78071
    Feature - Runtime Async
  • Simplify internal analyzer api #78070
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove EditorFeatures from OOP #78069
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update RoslynAnalyzer package projects with dependencies #78068
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Generate documentation - update API shape #78067
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Driver generics3 #78065
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.14] Fix crash in backing field nullability cycle scenario #78055
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Field Keyword, 17.14
  • Move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace construction to background thread #78051
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove EditorFeatures reference from ServiceHub #78043
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make Razor redirect code more robust #78039
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Update PublishData.json after VS span to main #78049
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Localize exception messages for gladstone/roslyn integration #78063
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update gladstone/roslyn api #78057
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Reapply "Remove the ProjectDiagnosticAnalyzer type (#77899)" (#77969) #77970
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Simplify channel-processing code in SemanticSearch. #78060
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Unseal LSP types #78041
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support concurrent gladstone extension unloading #78056
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Semantic Search: Add support for async queries and FAR tool #77906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Disable TransitiveVersioningPinning for RoslynAnalyzers. #78037
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix crash in backing field nullability cycle scenario #77993
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure external access extensions package gets codebase #78030
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Extensions: ref safety analysis #77967
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Next
  • Update dependency versions #78048
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from build tools #78047
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [main] Disable TransitiveVersioningPinning for RoslynAnalyzers. #78038
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from codelens layer #78045
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from lsp tests #78044
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add unit tests for gladstone extension handling service. #78034
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Improve detection of code whose updates may not have effect #78009
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Expression trees: support optional arguments and named arguments in parameter order #77972
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update `RuntimeHelpers.Await` rules #77957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Update ignored directives public API #77968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Ignored Directives
  • Switch to using field+auto-prop #76906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add stubs for semantic model apis needed by IDE #77448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures #77707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • WIP: Remove source generator diagnostic reporting from Workspace #76863
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update resourceManagement.yml #77948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Bind compound assignment operator declarations #77999
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Implement support for triggering Fix All from additional files #74695
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Execute core compiler from full framework msbuild #77914
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Implement `IParsable<TSelf>` et cetera on `IPEndPoint` #114405
  • [infra][maccatalyst] Fix IO test compatibility issues occurring on MacCatalyst CI with macOS 14 #114403
  • [wasm][interpreter] interpreter splat intrinsics fail #114401
    10.0.0
  • Test build warning: Reference to undeclared extern assembly 'mscorlib'. Attempting autodetect #114397
    10.0.0
  • DllImport Unable to Load Native Library After .NET Upgrade #114393
  • Build warnings: "Could not resolve reference..." #114390
    10.0.0
  • [mono-runtime] runtime build on mainline is taking very long time on s390x #114389
  • [wasm coreclr] build BCL for coreclr/wasm #114379
    Future
  • Cannot suppress obsolete or experimental errors that use a custom diagnostic ID #114377
  • Contract violation in SetupOleContext #114372
    10.0.0
  • MONO interpreter: NIY encountered in method #114370
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 12 Regressions on 4/5/2025 12:48:28 AM +00:00 #114382
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 4/3/2025 2:37:57 PM +00:00 #114384
  • [Perf] Regressions from increasing inline budget #114383
  • HybridCache and L1 memory usage #114366
  • [API Proposal]: String.Manipulation generic overloads with ReadOnlySpan<T> #114365
  • Non-zero result of Vector3.Cross with parallel vectors #114361

Closed

  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M09.5-PDC/b12795/b12795/b12795.cmd #113458
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/dev10/b400791/_b400971b400971/_b400971b400971.cmd #113457
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/dev10/b400791/_b400971b400971/_b400971b400971.cmd #114178
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests/LocallocLarge_d/LocallocLarge_d.dll #113459
    10.0.0
  • [Unified Build] Unsigned .js files in runtime artifacts #114353
  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-preview.3.25174.5] Failed to build the retargeted paint.net with CS0104 and CS8377 #114115
  • JIT: `InstanceBasedFunctionPointer(useExplicitThis: True)` test fails with tailcallstress #114213
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: SerializeAsync with Utf8JsonWriter #114373
  • Discrepancy between HttpRequest/ResponseMessage.ToString and HttpHeaders.ToString #49674
    Future
  • Support precompiling CCW vtables in ILC cctor interpreter (Native AOT) #114024
  • [API Proposal]: 'ComWrappers' methods to get runtime-provided 'IUnknown' CCW vtable entries #114133
  • Blazor Server vs WASM - different output on `enumerable is ICollection<int>` #111147
  • C++ include guards under src\gc need cleanup for portability #3975
  • [API Proposal]: Add RemoveFirst/RemoveLast of `List<T>` #114319
  • No support in ExpandoObject for case-insensitive #41831
  • [RFC] Sanitizer support #42361

PullRequests

Created

  • Mark profiler\DynamicOptimization test JitOptimizationSensitive #114417
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Prepare cert tests for new signing algorithms #114416
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 10.0.0
  • [wasm][interp] Fix PackedSimd.Splat intrinsic lookup #114413
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Speed up floating to integer casts on x86/x64 #114410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • XML documentation for `ProviderAliasAttribute` improved. #114408
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Use 'ref readonly' in 'Unsafe.AsPointer' #114406
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][interp] Add Round alias #114399
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add ability to raise `AppDomain.UnhandledException` event. #114392
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix edge cases in Tarjan GC bridge (Android) #114391
    Servicing-consider, os-android, area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • WIP #114388
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [RuntimeAsync] Disallow introduction of captured byrefs in strength reduction #3077

PullRequests

Created

  • [RuntimeAsync] Rename async2 -> async in JIT and JIT-EE interface #3076

Updated

  • [Swift Bindings] Implement Swift native handle as `SafeHandle` #3052
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift Bindings] Emitter redesign proposal #3059
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge feb25 #2993
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet add package` does not recognize `requireLicenseAcceptance` #48273
  • `dotnet tool install` does not recognize `requireLicenseAcceptance` #48272
  • Change the default Windows SDK version #48263
  • Diagnostics for package directive #48262
  • Statement completion for package IDs and versions for package directives #48261
  • Simplify restoring the workload manifest msi in the VMR build #48252
    10.0.1xx
  • Cleanup 'dotnet run file' artifacts #48250

Closed

  • Better error message for missing workloads? #21956
  • dotnet workload commands that fail leave the sdk in a bad state #21953
  • Freestyle Jenkins msBuild command #21893
  • MSBuildSdkResolver sometimes uses 32-bit SDK paths in VS 2022 #21765
  • .net 6 sdk rc1 - Nuget Credentials Provider plugin not being used properly #21690
  • Are there any known issues regarding dotnet pack in combination with azure devops? #4282
  • VersionSuffix (or --version-suffix) ignored if PackageVersion or Version set #38698
  • Add `--format json` option to `dotnet new install` #47958
  • Keep working directory clean in `dotnet run file.cs` #48172
    10.0.1xx
  • Custom metadata on framework references is ignored when a NuGet package references the same assembly #1443
    Backlog
  • dotnet pack on maccatalyst with Release config misconfigures search path for files #48041

PullRequests

Created
